H0.text: Who wrote much of King George V's first Christmas broadcast, made in 1932. Rudyard's contemporary, H.G. Wells

H1.text: Who wrote much of King George V's first Christmas broadcast, made in 1932. Winston Churchill

H2.text: Who wrote much of King George V's first Christmas broadcast, made in 1932. E.M. Forster

H3.text: Who wrote much of King George V's first Christmas broadcast, made in 1932. Kipling

A4.text: Kipling scripted the first Royal Christmas Message, delivered via the BBC's Empire Service by George V in 1932.
